Title: Prohibits tax credits against real property tax for franchise fees collected and remitted by cable television companies to assessing units
Summary: Prohibits a cable company from receiving tax credits against real property tax for franchise fees collected and remitted by such cable television companies to assessing units.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to prohibiting tax credits against real property tax for franchise fees collected and remitted by cable television companies to assessing units
